Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Overland Drive, west of the southern edge of the Necropolis.
Room.LongDescription: You can make out the Allisk Manor to the west of here. The entrance appears to be at the two large gates a little ways to the northwest. On the northeast side of the road, you can see the southern borders of the Necropolis. The Necropolis is protected by a wall of iron bars preventing people from entering the facility without going through the proper channels.
